abstract: Viewers came back in droves for the long-delayed return of “Project Runway,” which began its run on Lifetime on Thursday after five seasons on Bravo.
snippet: Viewers came back in droves for the long-delayed return of “Project Runway,” which began its run on Lifetime on Thursday after five seasons on Bravo.
lead_paragraph: Viewers came back in droves for the long-delayed return of “Project Runway,” which began its run on Lifetime on Thursday after five seasons on Bravo. According to Nielsen’s estimates, the reality show earned its highest ratings ever for a debut episode with 4.2 million viewers at 10 p.m., surging ahead of the previous record (2.9 million) set a year ago for the start of the show’s fifth season.
